item.description:
We have made a deal w/ the Urban Art Bar. We have a groupon for this event and they've extended the deal for additional people. It will be $25/person. The price is great deal and includes appetizers and sodas. Their regular price is $35/person and doesn't include food/drinks. You can pay us at the event

We will have the studio reserved  for our own group. It will be fun to get together and show off our artistic side :)

The classes are in a casual atmosphere, you pick the painting you want to try according to their online calendar. They have an instructor on hand also to help us w/ our masterpieces.

The paint bar website - http://theurbanartbar.com/

Please only RSVP if you plan to go. We do need an accurate head count so if your plans change then please udpate your RSVP asap.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Urban Art Bar + Drinks
